attributes.action: open an eating disorder inpatient unit in northern ireland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
we currently have no intense inpatient care here in northern ireland for eating disorders. patients are sent to the mainland UK for treatment. patients are therefore feeling homesick and alone without regular visits and often dont have enough funding to have the treatment to the full.
to have an eating disorder unit here would make it easier for patients to have visitors, home leave and proper aftercare.
